text: here's how to keep yourself and others
safe while you're shopping shop alone if
you can the fewer people who go out the
less the virus can spread work out
what's changed is there a different door
for the entrance and exit in a queue
stand two meters from everyone else if
there isn't one check there's room
inside the shop for you to protect
yourself and the people who work there
the shops layout may have been changed
look for signs if there's a one-way
system stick to it and avoid going back
on yourself stay 2 meters away from
everyone else where social distancing
isn't possible cover your face try to
only touch the things you're going to
buy and pay contactless if you can and
if you're returning items calls a shop
beforehand to see how they'd like things
to be returned they may have a
no-contact collection point overall
everything could be slower remember
everyone is finding this strange
including the staff so be considerate if
someone needs more time
